title: So Lucian is a: Burst, Hyper-Carry, Mobile, Ranged, Lane Bully, AD Assassin.
body:
With over a 70% pick rate in high elo. 

Riot: "LOL, TOTALLY BALANCED!"

Well I'll be damned. It's a pity about the cosplay incident, people who try and harass and shame artists are deplorable.

Wow. Good troll.
I have my moments.

Nocturne?

Time to buff {{champion:43}} 
"Never again will I sit idle."
Definitely no assassin.

> [{quoted}](name=Pojalsta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=46EgciUP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-21T06:49:08.017+0000)
>
> Definitely no assassin.

You obviously havent seen a high elo Lucian 100 to 0 someone in under 2 seconds.

> [{quoted}](name=Boomerangbro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=46EgciUP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-21T07:47:24.295+0000)
>
> You obviously havent seen a high elo Lucian 100 to 0 someone in under 2 seconds.

Then whats the difference between assassin and burst? Is Veigar an assasin? Annie?
Assassins have mobility to close in on their target. Outside of Flash, Veigar and Annie have no gapclosers.

Not necessarily.  An assassin is supposed to be someone who can pick off *one* priority target very quickly.  They don't necessarily have to have mobility.
Bursters are usually less capable of getting at a priority target, while also having more AoE damage.  Veigar and Annie have a lot of AoE damage, but low target access.
Someone like Eve has no mobility, but she's an assassin because she still has some method of target access (stealth/flanking) and most of her damage is single-target.
TBH I forgot about Ev, normally I see her built AP bruiser.
Everyone forgot about Eve. :(

> [{quoted}](name=Boomerangbro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=46EgciUP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-21T07:47:24.295+0000)
>
> You obviously havent seen a high elo Lucian 100 to 0 someone in under 2 seconds.

High elo? Or highly fed in high elo? XD

Pretty much any game in high elo. He is extremely broken and is picked pretty much every game. I hate facing him and it's super annoying that he is picked SO consistently. He has no real weaknesses and his passive allows him to build items that other carries would lose damage with (Maw, etc) and lose no damage for it. His Ult also hits for 2k+ late game easily and unless you have two forms of mobility to get away from it/him or around him he can ghost your movements with his + movement speed and his dash. Meaning if you are trying to kill him he can just W-Ult and kite you while you take thousands of damage, and even if you turn to disengage he can just follow you with it. It's stupid. And that's the least dumb part of his kit, the ability with the most counterplay. He also has no mana costs with Reaver and no cooldowns. His E gets partial resets in flat amounts making high amounts of CDR on him hyperscale his mobility. It also resets his autoattack for some reason. His passive basically says his autos do 60% additional damage (compared to Corki's 10% additional damage which was broken too, and was removed) his Q is almost instant and does a ton of damage, W gives him a free alacrity-enchanted boots of swiftness ON TOP of his movement speed. Dumb broken champ.
It does not matter what champion it is anyone with decent skill can 100-0 as a carry if fed

> [{quoted}](name=Pojalsta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=46EgciUP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-21T06:49:08.017+0000)

just watch someone beat a LB as lucian mid, in master/challenger so yea...
I don't see the relevancy at all in this statement.
Better Nerf {{champion:136}} because ppl who learned one fo the hardest champions are performing rather better than average.
i died inside when i saw the nerfs

God forbids a medium range mage to have actual damage. Also God forbids that learning a hard champion makes you above average in performance.

But yeah, Fizz can have free kills for each landed R and Lucian can burst/sustain/mobility all he wants.

yep {{champion:238}} just has to press R and delete a carry 
{{champion:67}} free true damage on a passive that isnt even a toggle plus a stealth and one of the most powerful AD steroids in the game 
{{champion:23}} ignores death and becomes a master split pusher while using RNG for wining trades early in lane with crits that half health people 
{{champion:157}} W itself negates half a ranged mages kit like nothing 
 {{champion:122}} gets penta kils from pressing R 
{{champion:48}} wins almost any 1V1 by stealing stats 
{{champion:203}} point and click % health damage and a death negating ult plus low CD dashes plus another % health damage Q with a slow 
{{champion:245}} cancerously over loaded kit with too much utility as an assassin like game play

The best ADC in the game right now is Ezreal, with Lucian bringing up a close second place.

Every other ADC is trash in comparison. Thanks Rito.
That's because Lucian doesn't bring cc compaired to Ezreal iceborn build. It's litterly the only thing Lucian doesn't have.

untill {{item:3142}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3025}} 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/but-why.gif

I mean the cooldown you can buy caps at 40% but the build you listed is 50%

so? he benefits from dropping spells in between his aa's and armorpen is good no?

so yea not the optimal amount of cdr but thats a small sacrifice

 cdr caps at 45% these days :P
max cdr from items is 40%. The mastery that increases cdr cap also gives 5% cdr. everything he said was 100% correct.
